rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0001
rows.name: A Driver doesn't go on adventures alone, you know.

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You adventure with Blades who have all sorts
of knowledge and skills, right?

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0003
rows.name:
They can see footprints and track them, destroy
large rocks, or burn fallen trees.

rows.label: tlk41700222_01_msg0004
rows.name:
When you're deciding which Blades to bring along,
you've got to judge them by more than just their
fighting strength.
